Ref: CXP067/2023

Criteria:

  • Certified Trade Test as Millwright
  • Hold a wireman’s license / electrical trade test
  • At least 5 years proven experience as a Millwright artisan with strong
    mechanical maintenance skills and experience
  • Medically fit to work on industrial and mining sites.
  • Valid driver’s license.
  • Prepared to work shifts, standby, callouts, and overtime
  • Ability to work at heights and in confined spaces.
  • Computer literate
  • Grade 12 / N3 / Equivalent NQF Level 4 qualification (Preferred)
    Apply via website or alternatively, via: https://forms.gle/8mRbBqpY1WY7fSPs7
